verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Alleluia! Alleluia! newline Hearts to heaven and voices raise; newline Sing to God a hymn of gladness, newline Sing to God a hymn of praise. newline He who on the cross as Savior, newline For the world's salvation bled; newline Jesus Christ, the King of Glory, newline Now is risen from the dead.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Now the iron bars are broken, newline Christ from death to life is born, newline Glorious life, and life immortal, newline On this resurrection morn; newline Christ has triumphed, and we conquer newline By His mighty enterprise; newline We with Him to life eternal, newline By His resurrection rise.
